item.title: Teaching
item.description: Instructor of Record University of Arizona Spring 2019 -- CHS/SOC 421: Sociology of Drugs and Addiction Fall 2018, Winter 2018-19 (online) -- CHS/SOC 404: Sociology of Mental Health Summer 2018 (online) -- CHS/SOC 202: Connecting Health and Society Winter 2017-18 (online) -- CHS/SOC 401: Health Disparities in Society Summer 2017 (online) -- CHS/SOC 280: Students, Schools, and Society Summer 2016 (online) -- CHS/SOC 101: Introduction to Sociology Arkansas State University Mid-South (formerly Mid-South Community College)
